uid.description: A unique identifier for the record

created_at.description: The creation date and time of the entity

updated_at.description: The last updated date and time of the entity

app_id.description: The unique identifier of the app.

owner_type.description: The type of the assignee. Directory - assigned to the entire directory; Business - assigned to a specific business; User - assigned to a specific user

pre_installed.description: Indicates whether or not the app is pre-installed for the owner when a business account is created.

app_market.description: Indicates whether or not the app is available in the app market for the owner.

uninstallable.description: Indicates whether or not the app can be uninstalled by the owner.
